user.title: Reef Sentinel
user.description: Enter your Reef Sentinel API key.

error.invalid_auth: API key rejected by Reef Sentinel (401/403). Verify the Home Assistant API key.
error.cannot_connect: Network error from Home Assistant to Reef Sentinel API.
error.timeout: Connection timed out while contacting Reef Sentinel API.
error.server_error: Reef Sentinel API server error (5xx). Try again later.
error.invalid_response: Reef Sentinel API returned an unexpected response.

abort.already_configured: This Reef Sentinel account is already configured
